settings.disableEmberRodAbility: द्वीप एम्बर रॉड को अक्षम करें
settings.hideAuctionHousePlayers: महत्वपूर्ण एनपीसी के पास खिलाड़ी छिपाएँ
settings.ignoreItemFrameClicks: फ़्रेम आइटम पर क्लिक को अनदेखा करें
settings.stopBowChargeFromResetting: रीसेट करने से धनुष चार्ज बंद करो
settings.dontResetCursorInventory: सूची के बीच कर्सर को रीसेट न करें
settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: अंत में हरे रंग में एंडरचेस्ट बनाएं

messages.dropConfirmation: Drop this item again to confirm!
messages.labymod: Labymod Users: Hide Food, Armor, and Health Bar, is incompatible.
messages.minionCannotReach: A %type% minion cannot reach and has stopped spawning!
messages.minionIsFull: A minion on your island is full!
messages.deleteOldFile: The download has finished, please open your mods folder using the button below, close your Minecraft, and delete the old version (or delete it later if you prefer).

update.majorAvailable: A new major update (%version%) is available! The link for the download can be found in chat.
update.patchAvailable: A new patch update (%version%) is available! Look in chat for download options!
update.downloading: The patch is downloading! Status: %downloaded%/%total% Please note that after the download has finished, you must delete the old file.
update.failed: The patch download has failed! Please download it manually using the link in chat.
update.downloadFinished: The patch has finished downloading. It has been saved as %file%. Please don't forget to delete the old file after closing your Minecraft. Click the message in chat to open up the folder.

messages.cancelledStemBreak: SkyblockAddons has stopped you from breaking this stem. Use your bare hand if you'd like to actually break it.
messages.cancelledCaneBreak: SkyblockAddons has stopped you from breaking this block of sugar cane. Use another tool if you'd actually like to break it.
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: SkyblockAddons has stopped you from opening this player's profile while holding a bow.
messages.cancelledDropping: SkyblockAddons has stopped you from dropping this rare item or tool from your hotbar.
messages.clickMoreTimes: Click/drop this item %times% more times if you really want to do this.
